definition: of or pertaining to a number system having 16 as its base, an evil spell, cast a spell over someone or something
details:
adjective
- of or pertaining to a number system having 16 as its base
= synonyms: hexadecimal
noun
- an evil spell
= synonyms: curse, jinx, whammy
verb
- cast a spell over someone or something
= example: cast a spell over someone or something
= synonyms: glamour
